adverb.description: In a way that demonstrates a sensible and practical idea of what can be achieved or expected.
examples: how well can each candidate realistically expect to do?
realistically, at his age opportunities are few and far between

adverb.description: In a way that is accurate and true to life.
examples: this film realistically simulates the effects that a nuclear war could have
Cubist artists did not try to paint realistically
